244241.「あわわっ！ びっくりしたぁ！\n アンタ 誰よ？: Aaah! You scared me! Who are you?

244242.「へぇー <pc>っていうの。\n アンタも デスマスターの志望者なんだぁ。:
Wow, <pc>. So you're a death master
aspirant too.

244243.「って そりゃ そっかー。\n 墓石に囲まれた こーんな しんきくさいトコ\n:
That's right, that's right. I wouldn't have
come unless I was called to such a scary place
surrounded by gravestones.

244244.「あらあらぁ 正直な子は 好きよ～。\n でも デスマスターを目指すからには\n:
Oh my gosh, I love an honest girl! But you'll
have to get used to this atmosphere if you
want to be a death master.

244245.「アタシは ネリム。アンタと同じく\n デスマスターを こころざす者だよ。\n:
I am Nelim. Like you, I'm a death master with
a heart of gold. I'm the one who holds the
Death Master in my heart, just like you.

244246.「わたくしは デスマスターの デズリン。\n あなたに 手紙をさしあげた者よ。\:
I am Deathlin, the Death Master. I'm the one
who wrote to you. Thank you for responding to
my call.

244247.「わたくしの 弟子になると決心したなら\n 一人前のデスマスターに してさしあげ:
If you decide to become my apprentice, I will
make you a full-fledged death master.

244248.「デズリン師匠に 手紙で呼ばれて\n のこのこ やって来たものの\n ひとりで:
I came here by myself after receiving a letter
from Master Deathlin, but I was worried about
being alone.

244249.「そうそう デズ師匠ってば 自分で書いた\n 参考書まで 用意してくれてるんだよ:
Oh yeah, Master Dez even wrote his own
reference book for me.

244250.「うふふ。面と向かって言われると 照れるわ～。\n 今後 み～っちり デスマスタ:
Hmmm. It's embarrassing to hear you say that to my face. From now on, I'm going to teach you the ins and outs of death mastering.
Prepare yourself.

244251.「さて <pc>さん。まずは こちらに来て\n わたくしの話を 聞いてくださいな:
Well <pc>. First of all, come over
here and listen to what I have to say.

246591.「しっかし こんな本まで出してる\n デスマスターだなんて……尊敬しちゃうなぁ。:
I can't believe you are a death master who has
even published such a book...I have a lot of
respect for you.
